title: Help: reconnect game crash problem
body: is anyone else having this issue? after champion selection the game brings up the reconnect button and restarting the client or computer doesnt help. im now in low priority que for afk'ing twice in a row now because of that. RIOT please help!

replies.body:
That really sucks about that LPQ D: but hopefully this post can help prevent you from getting a LPQ again.

It's more than likely an issue going on with your connection that's bringing up the reconnect button. This [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) is a great start to troubleshooting the interruption in connecting to the server. Be sure to follow all those steps and then them out in a custom match.

If you're still seeing the reconnect button, reach out to our Tech team in [a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to troubleshoot further.
